member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Common.Columns.IBoundColumn.Field
member.summary: The name of the field whose data the grid will display. You can use the nameof operator.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Common.Columns.IBoundColumn.FieldType
member.summary: The type of the field whose data the grid will display. You need to pass this parameter only if you are using ExpandoObject or Dictionary.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Common.Columns.IBoundColumn.Editable
member.summary: Whether the field can be edited by the user. If set to false, an editor will not be rendered for this column when the user edits an existing record.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Common.Columns.IBoundColumn.Filterable
member.summary: Whether the user can filter this column. When set to false, the filter cell will remain empty.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Common.Columns.IBoundColumn.FilterMenuType
member.summary: Specifies the filter menu type.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Common.Columns.IBoundColumn.TextAlign
member.summary: Specifies the text alignemnt of the column.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Common.Columns.IBoundColumn.Sortable
member.summary: Specifies whether the column can be sorted. Field is required.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Common.Columns.IBoundColumn.DisplayTitle
member.summary: Specifies the column display title.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Common.Columns.IBoundColumn.DisplayFormat
member.summary: Specifies the column display title.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Common.Columns.IBoundColumn.ShowFilterCellButtons
member.summary: Specifies whether the buttons within the filter cell are rendered or not. Default value is true. Applicable when FilterMode is set to FilterRow.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Common.Columns.IBoundColumn.DefaultFilterOperator
member.summary: Specifies the default filter operator. If a value is not provided, the default operator will be set based on the data type. See .

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Common.Columns.IBoundColumn.Template
member.summary: The template for the cells of this column. Used when the row is in read mode. You can render custom components and apply logic in it.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Common.Columns.IBoundColumn.HeaderTemplate
member.summary: The template for the header cell of this column. When the template is used, the Title text is not rendered by default. You can render custom components and apply logic in it.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Common.Columns.IBoundColumn.FooterTemplate
member.summary: The template for the footer cell of this column. You can render custom components and apply logic in it.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Common.Columns.IBoundColumn.EditorTemplate
member.summary: The template rendered in the cell when the user is editing the row. You can render custom components and apply logic in it.

member.name: T:Telerik.Blazor.Common.ObjectMetadataHelper
member.summary: Helper class thas generates metadata object descriptors for managed objects and stores them in , which internally compares objects using .

member.name: M:Telerik.Blazor.Common.ObjectMetadataHelper.GetOrCreateId(System.Object)
member.summary: Atomically searches for a specified key in the table and returns the unique identifier(Id) of the corresponding value. If the key does not exist, the method invokes the parameterless constructor of the class that represents the table's value to create a value that is bound to the specified key.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.TelerikBadge.Position
member.summary: Controls how the Badge positions in relation to its parent element. Valid values are: - The center of the Badge displays on the edge of the parent element. - The Badge is positioned entirely inside the parent element. - The Badge is positioned entirely outside the parent element. By default, the center of the Badge displays on the edge of the parent element.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.TelerikBadge.HorizontalAlign
member.summary: Controls if the Badge will render on the left or the right side of the parent element. Valid values are: - The Badge renders on the left side of the parent element. - The Badge renders on the right side of the parent element. By default, the Badge renders on the right side of the parent element.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.TelerikBadge.VerticalAlign
member.summary: Controls if the Badge will render above or below the parent element. Valid values are: - The Badge renders above the parent element. - The Badge renders below the parent element. By default, the Badge renders on top of the parent element.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.TelerikBadge.ShowCutoutBorder
member.summary: Defines if a margin renders between the Badge and the parent element where they overlap.

member.summary:

The default value is Medium.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.TelerikBadge.Rounded
member.summary:

The default value is Full.

member.summary:

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartCategoryAxis.AxisCrossingValue
member.summary: Category index at which the first value axis crosses this axis (when set as an object).Category indices at which the value axes cross the category axis (when set as an array).

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartCategoryAxis.Background
member.summary: The background color of the axis.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartCategoryAxis.BaseUnitStep
member.summary: The step (interval) between categories in base units. Setting it to "auto" will set the step to such value that the total number of categories does not exceed categoryAxis.maxDateGroups.This option is ignored if categoryAxis.baseUnit is set to "fit".

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartCategoryAxis.Categories
member.summary: The category names. The chart will create a category for every item of the array.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartCategoryAxis.Color
member.summary: The color to apply to all axis elements. Accepts a valid CSS color string, including hex and rgb. Can be overridden by categoryAxis.labels.color andcategoryAxis.line.color.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartCategoryAxis.Max
member.summary: The last date displayed on the category date axis. By default, the minimum date is the same as the last category. This is often used in combination with the categoryAxis.min and categoryAxis.roundToBaseUnit options to set up a fixed date range.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartCategoryAxis.MaxDateGroups
member.summary: The maximum number of groups (categories) to display whencategoryAxis.baseUnit is set to "fit" orcategoryAxis.baseUnitStep is set to "auto".

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartCategoryAxis.Min
member.summary: The first date displayed on the category date axis. By default, the minimum date is the same as the first category. This is often used in combination with the categoryAxis.min and categoryAxis.roundToBaseUnit options to set up a fixed date range.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartCategoryAxis.Name
member.summary: The unique axis name. Used to associate a series with a category axis using the series.categoryAxis option.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartCategoryAxis.StartAngle
member.summary: The angle (degrees) of the first category on the axis.Angles increase clockwise and zero is to the left. Negative values are acceptable.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartCategoryAxis.Visible
member.summary: If set to true the chart will display the category axis. By default the category axis is visible.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartCategoryAxis.WeekStartDay
member.summary: The week start day when categoryAxis.baseUnit is set to "weeks".The supported values are: kendo.days.Sunday - equal to 0; kendo.days.Monday - equal to 1; kendo.days.Tuesday - equal to 2; kendo.days.Wednesday - equal to 3; kendo.days.Thursday - equal to 4; kendo.days.Friday - equal to 5 or kendo.days.Saturday - equal to 6.

member.summary: Specifies the base time interval for the axis.

member.name: T:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartCategoryAxisLabels
member.summary: Telerik UI ChartCategoryAxisLabels.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartCategoryAxisLabels.Background
member.summary: The background color of the labels. Accepts a valid CSS color string, including hex and rgb.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartCategoryAxisLabels.Color
member.summary: The text color of the labels. Accepts a valid CSS color string, including hex and rgb.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartCategoryAxisLabels.Font
member.summary: The font style of the labels. Accepts a valid CSS color string, for example "20px 'Courier New'".

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartCategoryAxisLabels.Format
member.summary: The format used to display the labels. Uses kendo.format. Contains one placeholder ("{0}") which represents the category value.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartCategoryAxisLabels.Mirror
member.summary: If set to true the chart will mirror the axis labels and ticks. If the labels are normally on the left side of the axis, mirroring the axis will render them to the right.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartCategoryAxisLabels.Skip
member.summary: The number of labels to skip. By default no labels are skipped.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartCategoryAxisLabels.Step
member.summary: The label rendering step - render every n-th label. By default every label is rendered.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartCategoryAxisLabels.Template
member.summary: The template which renders the labels.The fields which can be used in the template are: value - the category value; dataItem - the data item, in case a field has been specified. If the category does not have a corresponding item in the data then an empty object will be passed.; format - the default format of the label or culture - the default culture (if set) on the label.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartCategoryAxisLabels.Visible
member.summary: If set to true the chart will display the category axis labels. By default the category axis labels are visible.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartCategoryAxisLabels.Position
member.summary: Specifies the position of the labels.

member.name: T:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartCategoryAxisLabelsBorder
member.summary: Telerik UI ChartCategoryAxisLabelsBorder.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartCategoryAxisLabelsBorder.Color
member.summary: The color of the border. Accepts a valid CSS color string, including hex and rgb.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartCategoryAxisLabelsBorder.DashType
member.summary: The dash type of the border.The following dash types are supported: "dash" - a line consisting of dashes; "dashDot" - a line consisting of a repeating pattern of dash-dot; "dot" - a line consisting of dots; "longDash" - a line consisting of a repeating pattern of long-dash; "longDashDot" - a line consisting of a repeating pattern of long-dash-dot; "longDashDotDot" - a line consisting of a repeating pattern of long-dash-dot-dot or "solid" - a solid line.

member.summary: Telerik UI ChartLegend.

member.summary: The background color of the legend. Accepts a valid CSS color string, including hex and rgb.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartLegend.Height
member.summary: The legend height when the legend.orientation is set to "vertical".

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartLegend.OffsetX
member.summary: The X offset of the chart legend. The offset is relative to the default position of the legend. For instance, a value of 20 will move the legend 20 pixels to the right of its initial position. A negative value will move the legend to the left of its current position.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartLegend.OffsetY
member.summary: The Y offset of the chart legend. The offset is relative to the current position of the legend. For instance, a value of 20 will move the legend 20 pixels down from its initial position. A negative value will move the legend upwards from its current position.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartLegend.Reverse
member.summary: If set to true the legend items will be reversed.Available in versions 2013.3.1306 and later.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartLegend.Spacing
member.summary: The spacing between the labels in pixels when the legend.orientation is "horizontal".

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartLegend.Visible
member.summary: If set to true the chart will display the legend. By default the chart legend is visible.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartLegend.Width
member.summary: The legend width when the legend.orientation is set to "horizontal".

member.summary: The template which renders the labels.The fields which can be used in the template are: text - the text the legend item.; series - the data series.; value - the point value. member.summary: The data item field which contains the category name or date.

member.summary: The data field containing the close value.

member.summary: The series base color. The supported values are: CSS color string, including hex and rgb or function(point) - user-defined function that will be evaluated for each point. Returning undefined will assume the default series color..

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeries.ColorField
member.summary: The data item field which contains the series color.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeries.DashType
member.summary: The dash type of line chart.The following dash types are supported: "dash" - a line consisting of dashes; "dashDot" - a line consisting of a repeating pattern of dash-dot; "dot" - a line consisting of dots; "longDash" - a line consisting of a repeating pattern of long-dash; "longDashDot" - a line consisting of a repeating pattern of long-dash-dot; "longDashDotDot" - a line consisting of a repeating pattern of long-dash-dot-dot or "solid" - a solid line.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeries.DownColor
member.summary: The series color when the open value is greater than the close value.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeries.DownColorField
member.summary: The data field containing the color applied when the open value is greater than the close value.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeries.DrilldownField
member.summary: The data field which contains the value to use to drill down into detailed data for the point.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeries.SummaryField
member.summary: The data item field which contains the summary type for waterfall series. Summary columns are optional and can be one of two types: "runningTotal" - Displays the sum of all items since the last "runningTotal" point. or "total" - Displays the sum of all previous items..

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeries.ExplodeField
member.summary: The data item field which contains a boolean value indicating whether the sector is exploded.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeries.Field
member.summary: The data item field which contains the series value. The field name should be a valid Javascript identifier and should contain only alphanumeric characters (or "$" or "_"), and may not start with a digit.

member.summary: The name of the parent series of the trendline.

member.summary: The data item field which contains the series to value.

member.summary: The data field containing the high value.

member.summary: The color to use for bar, column or waterfall series with negative values. Accepts a valid CSS color string, including hex and rgb.

member.summary: The series opacity. By default the series are opaque.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeries.OpenField
member.summary: The data field containing the open value.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeries.Padding
member.summary: The padding around the chart (equal on all sides).

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeries.Size
member.summary: The or radius of the chart donut series in pixels. If not set, the available space is split evenly between the series.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeries.SizeField
member.summary: The data field containing the bubble size value.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeries.Spacing
member.summary: The distance between series points within a category. Expressed as a percentage of the bar width.See the related gap setting.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeries.StartAngle
member.summary: The start angle (degrees) of the first donut or pie segment.Angles increase clockwise and zero is to the left. Negative values are acceptable.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeries.Visible
member.summary: Sets the visible property of a chart series

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeries.VisibleInLegend
member.summary: A value indicating whether to show the point category name (for funnel, donut and pie series) or series name (for other available series types) in the legend.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeries.VisibleInLegendField
member.summary: The data item field which indicates whether to show the point category name in the legend.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeries.Width
member.summary: The line width.

member.summary: The name of the X axis to use.For polar series the xAxis range is expressed in degrees.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeries.XField
member.summary: The data item field containing the X value.

member.summary: The name of the Y axis to use.** Available for bubble, scatter, scatterLine and polar series. **

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeries.YField
member.summary: The data item field containing the Y value.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeries.ZIndex
member.summary: An optional Z-index that can be used to change the default stacking order of series.The series with the highest Z-index will be placed on top.Series with no Z-index will use the default stacking order based on series type. For example line series will be on top with bar and area following below.

member.summary: Specifies the preferred series aggregate.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeriesLabels.AriaTemplate
member.summary: The name of the JS function, which returns the ARIA content of the series point.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeriesLabels.Background
member.summary: The background color of the labels. Accepts a valid CSS color string, including hex and rgb.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeriesLabels.Color
member.summary: The text color of the labels. Accepts a valid CSS color string, including hex and rgb.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeriesLabels.Distance
member.summary: The distance of the labels when series.type is set to "donut" or "pie".

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeriesLabels.Font
member.summary: The font style of the labels. Accepts a valid CSS font string, for example "20px Courier New'".

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeriesLabels.Format
member.summary: The format of the labels. Uses kendo.format.Format placeholders: Area, bar, column, line, pie, radarArea, radarColumn and radarLine{0} - value; Bubble{0} - x value{1} - y value{2} - size value{3} - category name; Bullet{0} - value{1} - target value; Scatter, scatterLine{0} - x value{1} - y value; PolarArea, polarLine and polarScatter{0} - x value (degrees){1} - y value; Candlestick and OHLC{0} - open value{1} - high value{2} - low value{3} - close value{4} - category name or RangeArea, rangeBar, rangeColumn{0} - from value{1} - to value.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeriesLabels.Rotation
member.summary: The rotation angle of the labels. By default, the labels are not rotated.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeriesLabels.Template
member.summary: The template which renders the chart series label.The fields which can be used in the template are: category - the category name. Available for area, bar, column, bubble, donut, line, pie and waterfall series.; dataItem - the original data item used to construct the point. Will be null if binding to array.; percentage - the point value represented as a percentage value. Available only for donut, pie and 100% stacked charts.; series - the data series; stackValue - the cumulative point value on the stack. Available only for stackable series.; value - the point value. Can be a number or object containing each bound field.; runningTotal - the sum of point values since the last "runningTotal" summary point. Available for waterfall series. or total - the sum of all previous series values. Available for waterfall series..

member.summary: If set to true the chart will display the series labels. By default chart series labels are not displayed.

member.summary: Value at which the category axis crosses this axis. (Only for object)Value indices at which the category axes cross the value axis. (Only for array)Date at which the category axis crosses this axis. (Only for date)

member.summary: The background color of the axis.

member.summary: The color of the value axis. Accepts a valid CSS color string, including hex and rgb.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartValueAxis.MajorUnit
member.summary: The interval between major divisions. If the valueAxis.type is set to "log", the majorUnit value will be used for the base of the logarithm.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartValueAxis.Max
member.summary: The maximum value of the axis.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartValueAxis.Min
member.summary: The minimum value of the axis. Under certain conditions, the narrowRange setting can overwrite this setting. To give priority to the min setting of your choice, set valueAxis.narrowRange to false.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartValueAxis.MinorUnit
member.summary: The interval between minor divisions. It defaults to 1/5 of the valueAxis.majorUnit. If the valueAxis.type is set to "log", the minorUnit value represents the number of divisions between two major units and defaults to the major unit minus one.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartValueAxis.Name
member.summary: The unique axis name. Used to associate a series with a value axis using the series.axis option.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartValueAxis.NarrowRange
member.summary: If set to true the Chart will narrow the value axis range in order to display data points in better detail. Setting it to false will force the automatic axis range to start from 0 or the explicitly specified valueAxis.min value.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartValueAxis.Visible
member.summary: If set to true the chart will display the value axis. By default the value axis is visible.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartValueAxis.ZIndex
member.summary: An optional Z-index that can be used to change the default stacking position of the valueAxis.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartValueAxis.Type
member.summary: Specifies the axis type.

member.summary: The font style of the labels. Accepts a valid CSS color string, for example "20px 'Courier New'".

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartValueAxisLabels.Format
member.summary: The format used to display the labels. Uses kendo.format. Contains one placeholder ("{0}") which represents the category value.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartValueAxisLabels.Mirror
member.summary: If set to true the chart will mirror the axis labels and ticks. If the labels are normally on the left side of the axis, mirroring the axis will render them to the right.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartValueAxisLabels.Skip
member.summary: The number of labels to skip. By default no labels are skipped.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartValueAxisLabels.Step
member.summary: Label rendering step. Every n-th label is rendered where n is the step

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartValueAxisLabels.Template
member.summary: The template which renders the labels.The fields which can be used in the template are: value - the value value.

member.summary: If set to true the chart will display the value axis labels. By default the category axis labels are visible.

member.summary: Telerik UI ChartXAxes.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartXAxis.AxisCrossingValue
member.summary: Value at which the Y axis crosses this axis. (Only for object)Value indices at which the Y axes cross the value axis. (Only for array)Date at which the Y axis crosses this axis. (Only for date)

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartXAxis.Background
member.summary: The background color of the axis.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartXAxis.BaseUnit
member.summary: The base time interval for the axis labels. The default baseUnit is determined automatically from the value range. Available options: milliseconds; seconds; minutes; hours; days; weeks; months or years.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartXAxis.Categories
member.summary: The category names. Applicable for charts with X and Y category axes (heatmap).

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartXAxis.Color
member.summary: The color of the axis. Accepts a valid CSS color string, including hex and rgb.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartXAxis.MajorUnit
member.summary: The interval between major divisions. If this is a date axis the value represents the number of xAxis.baseUnits between major divisions. If the xAxis.type is set to "log", the majorUnit value will be used for the base of the logarithm.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartXAxis.Max
member.summary: The maximum value of the axis.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartXAxis.Min
member.summary: The minimum value of the axis.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartXAxis.MinorUnit
member.summary: The interval between minor divisions. It defaults to 1/5 of the xAxis.majorUnit. If the xAxis.type is set to "log", the minorUnit value represents the number of divisions between two major units and defaults to the major unit minus one.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartXAxis.Name
member.summary: The unique axis name. Used to associate a series with a x axis using the series.xAxis option.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartXAxis.NarrowRange
member.summary: If set to true the chart will prevent the automatic axis range from snapping to 0. Setting it to false will force the automatic axis range to snap to 0.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartXAxis.Reverse
member.summary: If set to true the value axis direction will be reversed. By default values increase from left to right and from bottom to top.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartXAxis.StartAngle
member.summary: The angle (degrees) where the 0 value is placed. Applicable to polar series.Angles increase counterclockwise and zero is to the right. Negative values are acceptable.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartXAxis.Type
member.summary: The axis type.The supported values are: "numeric" - numeric axis.; "date" - specialized axis for displaying chronological data. or "log" - logarithmic axis..

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartXAxis.Visible
member.summary: If set to true the chart will display the x axis. By default the x axis is visible.

member.summary: Telerik UI ChartXAxisLabels.

member.summary: The text color of the labels. Accepts a valid CSS color string, including hex and rgb.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartXAxisLabels.Font
member.summary: The font style of the labels. Accepts a valid CSS color string, for example "20px 'Courier New'".

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartXAxisLabels.Format
member.summary: The format used to display the labels. Uses kendo.format. Contains one placeholder ("{0}") which represents the category value.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartXAxisLabels.Mirror
member.summary: If set to true the chart will mirror the axis labels and ticks. If the labels are normally on the left side of the axis, mirroring the axis will render them to the right.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartXAxisLabels.Skip
member.summary: The number of labels to skip.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartXAxisLabels.Step
member.summary: The label rendering step - render every n-th label. By default every label is rendered.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartXAxisLabels.Template
member.summary: The template which renders the labels.The fields which can be used in the template are: value - the category value.

member.summary: If set to true the chart will display the x axis labels. By default the x axis labels are visible.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartYAxis.AxisCrossingValue
member.summary: Value at which the Y axis crosses this axis. (Only for object)Value indices at which the Y axes cross the value axis. (Only for array)Date at which the Y axis crosses this axis. (Only for date)

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartYAxis.Background
member.summary: The background color of the axis.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartYAxis.BaseUnit
member.summary: The base time interval for the axis labels. The default baseUnit is determined automatically from the value range. Available options: milliseconds; seconds; minutes; hours; days; weeks; months or years.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartYAxis.Categories
member.summary: The category names. Applicable for charts with X and Y category axes (heatmap).

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartYAxis.Color
member.summary: The color of the axis. Accepts a valid CSS color string, including hex and rgb.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartYAxis.MajorUnit
member.summary: The interval between major divisions. If this is a date axis the value represents the number of xAxis.baseUnits between major divisions. If the yAxis.type is set to "log", the majorUnit value will be used for the base of the logarithm.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartYAxis.Max
member.summary: The maximum value of the axis.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartYAxis.Min
member.summary: The minimum value of the axis.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartYAxis.MinorUnit
member.summary: The interval between minor divisions. It defaults to 1/5 of the yAxis.majorUnit. If the yAxis.type is set to "log", the minorUnit value represents the number of divisions between two major units and defaults to the major unit minus one.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartYAxis.Name
member.summary: The unique axis name. Used to associate a series with a y axis using the series.yAxis option.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartYAxis.NarrowRange
member.summary: If set to true the chart will prevent the automatic axis range from snapping to 0. Setting it to false will force the automatic axis range to snap to 0.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartYAxis.Reverse
member.summary: If set to true the value axis direction will be reversed. By default values increase from left to right and from bottom to top.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartYAxis.Type
member.summary: The axis type.The supported values are: "numeric" - numeric axis.; "date" - specialized axis for displaying chronological data. or "log" - logarithmic axis..

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartYAxis.Visible
member.summary: If set to true the chart will display the y axis. By default the y axis is visible.

member.name: T:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartYAxisLabels
member.summary: Telerik UI ChartYAxisLabels.

member.summary: The background color of the labels. Accepts a valid CSS color string, including hex and rgb.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartYAxisLabels.Color
member.summary: The text color of the labels. Accepts a valid CSS color string, including hex and rgb.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartYAxisLabels.Font
member.summary: The font style of the labels. Accepts a valid CSS color string, for example "20px 'Courier New'".

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartYAxisLabels.Format
member.summary: The format used to display the labels. Uses kendo.format. Contains one placeholder ("{0}") which represents the category value.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartYAxisLabels.Mirror
member.summary: If set to true the chart will mirror the axis labels and ticks. If the labels are normally on the left side of the axis, mirroring the axis will render them to the right.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartYAxisLabels.Skip
member.summary: The number of labels to skip.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartYAxisLabels.Step
member.summary: The label rendering step - render every n-th label. By default every label is rendered.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartYAxisLabels.Template
member.summary: The template which renders the labels.The fields which can be used in the template are: value - the category value.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartYAxisLabels.Visible
member.summary: If set to true the chart will display the y axis labels. By default the y axis labels are visible.

member.summary: Specifies the position of the labels.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.Common.Menu.MenuPopupSettingsBase.HorizontalCollision
member.summary: Specifies the behavior of the Popup when it does not fit in the viewport. Valid values are: - the popup will flip if there is sufficient available space on the opposite side. - the popup will be shifted (moved) until it is fully visible. By default, the Popup fits horizontally when there is a collision.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.Common.Menu.MenuPopupSettingsBase.VerticalCollision
member.summary: Specifies the behavior of the Popup when it does not fit in the viewport. Valid values are: - the popup will flip if there is sufficient available space on the opposite side. - the popup will be shifted (moved) until it is fully visible. By default, the Popup flips vertically when there is a collision.

member.summary: The data field containing the close value.

member.summary: The series base color. The supported values are: CSS color string, including hex and rgb or function(point) - user-defined function that will be evaluated for each point. Returning undefined will assume the default series color..

member.summary: The data item field which contains the series color.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeriesDescriptor.DashType
member.summary: The dash type of line chart.The following dash types are supported: "dash" - a line consisting of dashes; "dashDot" - a line consisting of a repeating pattern of dash-dot; "dot" - a line consisting of dots; "longDash" - a line consisting of a repeating pattern of long-dash; "longDashDot" - a line consisting of a repeating pattern of long-dash-dot; "longDashDotDot" - a line consisting of a repeating pattern of long-dash-dot-dot or "solid" - a solid line.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeriesDescriptor.DownColor
member.summary: The series color when the open value is greater than the close value.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeriesDescriptor.DownColorField
member.summary: The data field containing the color applied when the open value is greater than the close value.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeriesDescriptor.DrilldownField
member.summary: The data field which contains the value to use to drill down into detailed data for the point.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeriesDescriptor.SummaryField
member.summary: The data item field which contains the summary type for waterfall series. Summary columns are optional and can be one of two types: "runningTotal" - Displays the sum of all items since the last "runningTotal" point. or "total" - Displays the sum of all previous items..

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.ChartSeriesDescriptor.ExplodeField
member.summary: The data item field which contains a boolean value indicating whether the sector is exploded.

member.name: T:Telerik.Blazor.Components.TelerikEditor
member.summary: The class for the Telerik Editor component.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.TelerikEditor.Plugins
member.summary: The name of the JS function declared in the global scope (window object) that will be used to provide custom ProseMirror plugins. The function accepts an arguments object with the following properties: 1. getSchema - a function that returns the current schema object. Before the editor is initialized, the schema is the default schema. After the editor is initialized, the schema is the current schema. 2. getView - a function that returns the currently used instance of EditorView object. Before the editor is initialized, the view (the result of the function) is null. 3. ProseMirror - object that contains various ProseMirror classes and functions. 4. getPlugins - function that accepts schema as an argument and returns the default Telerik Editor plugins. The function should return an array of ProseMirror plugins. Note: To ensure all the built-in functionalities of the Telerik Editor are working correctly, the result array should contain the default plugins which can be recieved by calling the getPlugins function.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.TelerikEditor.Schema
member.summary: The name of the JS function declared in the global scope (window object) that will be used to provide custom ProseMirror schema. The function accepts an arguments object with the following properties: 1. getSchema - a function that returns the current schema object. Before the editor is initialized, the schema is the default schema. After the editor is initialized, the schema is the current schema. 2. getView - a function that returns the currently used instance of EditorView object. Before the editor is initialized, the view (the result of the function) is null. 3. ProseMirror - object that contains various ProseMirror classes and functions. The function should return an instance of the ProseMirror Schema class.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.TelerikPopover.Collision
member.summary: Specifies the behavior of the Popover when it does not fit in the viewport. Valid values are: - the popover will flip if there is sufficient available space on the opposite side. - the popover will be shifted (moved) until it is fully visible. By default, the Popover flips vertically when there is a collision.

member.summary:
Define the event that triggers the opening of the popover. The supported values are:
If the value is set to the popover will close when the user clicks outside the popover. If the value is set to the popover will close when the pointer leaves the popover.

member.name: T:Telerik.Blazor.Components.TelerikPopup
member.summary: Represents the Telerik UI Popup component.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.TelerikPopup.HorizontalCollision
member.summary: Specifies the behavior of the Popup when it does not fit in the viewport. Valid values are: - the popup will flip if there is sufficient available space on the opposite side. - the popup will be shifted (moved) until it is fully visible. By default, the Popup fits horizontally when there is a collision.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.TelerikPopup.VerticalCollision
member.summary: Specifies the behavior of the Popup when it does not fit in the viewport. Valid values are: - the popup will flip if there is sufficient available space on the opposite side. - the popup will be shifted (moved) until it is fully visible. By default, the Popup flips vertically when there is a collision.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.TelerikPopup.HorizontalAlign
member.summary:
In combination with specifies which point of the popup element to attach to the anchor's origin point. The available X options are:
. By default, the attached point is the top-left corner of the popup element.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.TelerikPopup.VerticalAlign
member.summary:
In combination with specifies which point of the popup element to attach to the anchor's origin point. The available Y options are:
By default, the attached point is the top-left corner of the popup element.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.TelerikPopup.AnchorHorizontalAlign
member.summary:
In combination with , this specifies the point on the anchor to which the popup element should be attached. The available X options are:
By default the point to which the popup element is attached is the bottom-left corner of the anchor.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.TelerikPopup.AnchorVerticalAlign
member.summary:
In combination with , this specifies the point on the anchor to which the popup element should be attached. The available Y options are:
By default the point to which the popup element is attached is the bottom-left corner of the anchor.

member.summary: Specifies the horizontal offset value, in pixels, to be added to the popup position, creating a blank space between the popup and the anchor.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.TelerikPopup.VerticalOffset
member.summary: Specifies the vertical offset value, in pixels, to be added to the popup position, creating a blank space between the popup and the anchor.

member.summary: The error correction level used to encode the value.The possible values are: "L" - approximately 7% of the codewords can be restored.; "M" - approximately 15% of the codewords can be restored.; "Q" - approximately 25% of the codewords can be restored. or "H" - approximately 30% of the codewords can be restored..

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.TelerikRootComponent.CurrentBreakpoint
member.summary: The current breakpoint value is used internally in multiple components, allowing them to react to the current screen size width, utilizing its rendering. As we do not want to introduce any breaking changes in the already existing components, the value is chosen as the default one, as this corresponds to large screens(above 768px).

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.SankeyDataLink.Color
member.summary: The color of the link. The color is used when the colorType option is set to static. Accepts a valid CSS color string, including hex and rgb.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.SankeyDataLink.ColorType
member.summary: The color type of the link. The supported values are: "static" - The link color is static. The color is determined by the link's color option.; "source" - The link color is the same as the source node color. or "target" - The link color is the same as the target node color..

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.SankeyDataLink.Opacity
member.summary: The opacity of the links.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.SankeyDataLink.SourceId
member.summary: The source node ID of the link. The source node is the node from which the link originates.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.SankeyDataLink.TargetId
member.summary: The target node ID of the link. The target node is the node to which the link points.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.SankeyDataLink.Value
member.summary: The value of the link. The value represents the weight of the link and determines the width of the link.

member.summary: The opacity of the links when they are highlighted by hovering or tapping on them.

member.summary: The dash type of the border.The following dash types are supported: "dash" - a line consisting of dashes; "dashDot" - a line consisting of a repeating pattern of dash-dot; "dot" - a line consisting of dots; "longDash" - a line consisting of a repeating pattern of long-dash; "longDashDot" - a line consisting of a repeating pattern of long-dash-dot; "longDashDotDot" - a line consisting of a repeating pattern of long-dash-dot-dot or "solid" - a solid line.

member.summary: The height of the legend.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.SankeyLegend.OffsetX
member.summary: The X offset of the Sankey legend. The offset is relative to the default position of the legend. For instance, a value of 20 will move the legend 20 pixels to the right of its initial position. A negative value will move the legend to the left of its current position.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.SankeyLegend.OffsetY
member.summary: The Y offset of the Sankey legend. The offset is relative to the current position of the legend. For instance, a value of 20 will move the legend 20 pixels down from its initial position. A negative value will move the legend upwards from its current position.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.SankeyLegend.Reverse
member.summary: If set to true the legend items will be reversed.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.SankeyLegend.Spacing
member.summary: The spacing between the labels in pixels when the legend.orientation is "horizontal".

member.summary: If set to false the Sankey will not display the legend.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.StockChartCategoryAxis.BaseUnitStep
member.summary: The step (interval) between categories in base units. Setting it to "auto" will set the step to such value that the total number of categories does not exceed categoryAxis.maxDateGroups.This option is ignored if categoryAxis.baseUnit is set to "fit".

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.StockChartCategoryAxis.MaxDateGroups
member.summary: Specifies the maximum number of groups (categories) to produce when either baseUnit is set to "fit" or baseUnitStep is set to "auto".This option is ignored in all other cases.The default value is approximately equal to [widget width, px] / 30

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.StockChartLegend.OffsetX
member.summary: The X offset from its position. The offset is relative to the current position of the legend. For instance, a value of 20 will move the legend 20 pixels to the right of it's initial position. A negative value will move the legend to the left of the current position.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.StockChartLegend.OffsetY
member.summary: The Y offset from its position. The offset is relative to the current position of the legend. For instance, a value of 20 will move the legend 20 pixels down from it's initial position. A negative value will move the legend upwards from the current position.

member.summary: The background color of the axis.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.StockChartNavigatorCategoryAxis.BaseUnitStep
member.summary: The step (interval) between categories in base units. Setting it to "auto" will set the step to such value that the total number of categories does not exceed categoryAxis.maxDateGroups.This option is ignored if categoryAxis.baseUnit is set to "fit".

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.StockChartNavigatorCategoryAxis.Color
member.summary: The color to apply to all axis elements. Accepts a valid CSS color string, including hex and rgb. Can be overridden by categoryAxis.labels.color andcategoryAxis.line.color.

member.summary: The data item field which contains the category name. Requires the dataSource option to be set.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.StockChartNavigatorCategoryAxis.Justified
member.summary: If set to true the chart will position categories and series points on major ticks. This removes the empty space before and after the series.The default value is false except for "area" and "verticalArea".

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.StockChartNavigatorCategoryAxis.Max
member.summary: The last date displayed on the category date axis. By default, the minimum date is the same as the last category. This is often used in combination with the categoryAxis.min and categoryAxis.roundToBaseUnit options to set up a fixed date range.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.StockChartNavigatorCategoryAxis.MaxDateGroups
member.summary: The maximum number of groups (categories) to display whencategoryAxis.baseUnit is set to "fit" orcategoryAxis.baseUnitStep is set to "auto".

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.StockChartNavigatorCategoryAxis.Min
member.summary: The first date displayed on the category date axis. By default, the minimum date is the same as the first category. This is often used in combination with the categoryAxis.min and categoryAxis.roundToBaseUnit options to set up a fixed date range.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.StockChartNavigatorSeries.Data
member.summary: Array of data items. The data item type can be either a: Array of objects. Each point is bound to the specified series fields.; Array of numbers. Available for area, column and line series. or Array of arrays of numbers. Available for:OHLC and candlestick series (open, high, low, close).

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.StockChartNavigatorSeries.HighField
member.summary: The data field containing the high value.** Available for candlestick and ohlc series only **

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.StockChartNavigatorSeries.Field
member.summary: The data field containing the series value.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.StockChartNavigatorSeries.CategoryField
member.summary: The data item field which contains the category name or date.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.StockChartNavigatorSeries.Name
member.summary: The navigator series name.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.StockChartNavigatorSeries.Aggregate
member.summary: The aggregate function to apply for date series.This function is used when a category (an year, month, etc.) contains two or more points. The function return value is displayed instead of the individual points.The supported values are: "avg" - the average of all values for the date period.; "count" - the number of values for the date period.; "max" - the highest value for the date period.; "min" - the lowest value for the date period.; "sum" - the sum of all values for the date period. Defaults to 0 if no data points are defined.; "sumOrNull" - the sum of all values for the date period. Defaults to null if no data points are defined.; "first" - the first value; function(values, series, dataItems, category) - user-defined aggregate function. Returns single value or data item. or object - (compound aggregate) Applicable to "candlestick" and ohlc "series". Specifies the aggregate for each data item field..

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.StockChartNavigatorSeries.Axis
member.summary: The name of the value axis to use.** Applicable to area, column, line, ohlc and candlestick series **

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.StockChartNavigatorSeries.CloseField
member.summary: The data field containing the close value.** Available for candlestick and ohlc series only **

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.StockChartNavigatorSeries.Color
member.summary: The series base color. The supported values are: CSS color string, including hex and rgb or function(point) - user-defined function that will be evaluated for each point. Returning undefined will assume the default series color..

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.StockChartNavigatorSeries.ColorField
member.summary: The data field containing the point color.** Applicable for column, candlestick and ohlc series. **

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.StockChartNavigatorSeries.DownColor
member.summary: The series color when the open value is greater than the close value.** Available for candlestick series only **

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.StockChartNavigatorSeries.DownColorField
member.summary: The data field containing the color applied when the open value is greater than the close value.** Available for candlestick series only **

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.StockChartNavigatorSeries.Gap
member.summary: The distance between category clusters.** Applicable for column, candlestick and ohlc series. **

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.StockChartNavigatorSeries.LowField
member.summary: The data field containing the low value.** Available for candlestick and ohlc series **

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.StockChartNavigatorSeries.MissingValues
member.summary: The behavior for handling missing values. The supported values are: "gap" - the plot stops before the missing point and continues after it.; "interpolate" - the value is interpolated from neighboring points. or "zero" - the value is assumed to be zero..

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.StockChartNavigatorSeries.Style
member.summary: The supported values are: "normal" - The values will be connected with straight line. or "step" - The values will be connected with a line with right angle..

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.StockChartNavigatorSeries.Opacity
member.summary: The series opacity.

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.StockChartNavigatorSeries.OpenField
member.summary: The data field containing the open value.** Available for candlestick and ohlc series **

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.StockChartNavigatorSeries.Spacing

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.StockChartSeries.Aggregate
member.summary: The aggregate function to apply for date series.This function is used when a category (an year, month, etc.) contains two or more points. The function return value is displayed instead of the individual points.The supported values are: "avg" - the average of all values for the date period.; "count" - the number of values for the date period.; "max" - the highest value for the date period.; "min" - the lowest value for the date period.; "sum" - the sum of all values for the date period. Defaults to 0 if no data points are defined.; "sumOrNull" - the sum of all values for the date period. Defaults to null if no data points are defined.; "first" - the first value; function(values, series, dataItems, category) - user-defined aggregate function. Returns single value or data item. or object - (compound aggregate) Applicable to "candlestick" and ohlc "series". Specifies the aggregate for each data item field..

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.StockChartSeries.Color

member.name: P:Telerik.Blazor.Components.StockChartSeries.ZIndex
member.summary: An optional Z-index that can be used to change the default stacking order of series.The series with the highest Z-index will be placed on top.Series with no Z-index will use the default stacking order based on series type. For example line series will be on top with bar and area following below.

member.name: T:Telerik.Blazor.AnimationType
member.summary: Controls the animation through which animated containers are shown or hidden.

member.name: F:Telerik.Blazor.AnimationType.None
member.summary: None

member.name: F:Telerik.Blazor.AnimationType.SlideUp
member.summary: Shows with a sliding motion from the bottom edge towards the top edge. Hides with a sliding motion towards the bottom edge.

member.name: F:Telerik.Blazor.AnimationType.SlideIn
member.summary: Sliding motion.

member.name: F:Telerik.Blazor.AnimationType.SlideDown
member.summary: Shows with a sliding motion from the top edge towards the bottom edge. Hides with a sliding motion towards the top edge.

member.name: F:Telerik.Blazor.AnimationType.SlideRight
member.summary: Shows with a sliding motion from the left edge towards the right edge. Hides with a sliding motion towards the left edge.

member.name: F:Telerik.Blazor.AnimationType.SlideLeft
member.summary: Shows with a sliding motion from the right edge towards the left edge. Hides with a sliding motion towards the right edge.

member.name: F:Telerik.Blazor.AnimationType.PushUp
member.summary: Shows with a sliding motion from the top edge towards the bottom edge. Hides with a sliding motion towards the top edge.

member.name: F:Telerik.Blazor.AnimationType.PushDown
member.summary: Shows with a sliding motion from the bottom edge towards the top edge. Hides with a sliding motion towards the bottom edge.

member.name: F:Telerik.Blazor.AnimationType.PushLeft
member.summary: Shows with a sliding motion from the left edge towards the right edge. Hides with a sliding motion towards the left edge.

member.name: F:Telerik.Blazor.AnimationType.PushRight
member.summary: Shows with a sliding motion from the right edge towards the left edge. Hides with a sliding motion towards the right edge.

member.name: F:Telerik.Blazor.AnimationType.Fade
member.summary: Shows transparent and gradually becomes opaque. Hides by becoming transparent.

member.name: F:Telerik.Blazor.AnimationType.ZoomIn
member.summary: Shows the content larger than its final dimensions and reduces its size until it fits the container. Hides by expanding the content before fading away.

member.name: F:Telerik.Blazor.AnimationType.ZoomOut
member.summary: Shows the entire element with small dimensions in the center and increases all dimensions proportionally until its actual size is reached. Hides by reducing the size to the center point.

member.name: F:Telerik.Blazor.AnimationType.RevealVertical
member.summary: Animates the element by the height of its content

To complete this action, the site needs access to the clipboard.

Go to your browser's security settings and allow clipboard permissions for this site.

Alternatively, use one of the following shortcuts:

Cut = Ctrl/Cmd + X
Copy = Ctrl/Cmd + C
Paste = Ctrl/Cmd + V
.
